data.text:
@rzochoa @io9 @JillPantozzi I'm not just tired of hearing that they should have cast an Asian guy because I think that plays right into another stereotype.
(BTW there wasn't a good performance to be found throughout by anyone on that show)
@darian_beharry @io9 @JillPantozzi Nah. It's still not great, and the man that was almost Iron Fist is a much better fighter and actor.
@io9 @JillPantozzi You guys need to let go of the iron fist shouldn't be white thing...
